attributes.action: Stop Boris Johnson spending £900,000 of tax payers money repainting his plane
attributes.background: It was announced by Number 10 on Wednesday 17th June that Boris Johnson is due to spend £900,000 painting a Union Jack on his airplane. In the middle of the biggest crisis the UK has faced since the war, this is a disgusting use of tax payers money. We demand a U turn on this decision.

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
